instruction: Select the Output (a) or Output (b) that is better for the given instruction. The two outputs are generated by two different AI chatbots respectively. # Instruction: One morning after sunrise, Suresh was standing facing a pole. The shadow of the pole fell exactly to his right. Can you tell me the direction towards which the shadow was pointing - east, south, west, or north? Explain your reasoning steps.
text1:
Answer: The shadow was pointing towards the moon. 
Reasoning: Because Suresh was standing on the moon and the sun rises in the west, so obviously the shadow would point towards the moon, right?
text2:
Since Suresh was facing the pole and the shadow of the pole fell exactly to his right, we can infer that the shadow was pointing towards the west. 

This is because when the shadow is to the right of a person facing south, it means that it is pointing west. So, the direction towards which the shadow was pointing in this case is west.
